title: Celebrity Family Food Battle
overview: Hollywood celebrities team up with family members in a cooking competition that puts their culinary knowledge, or lack thereof, to the test. In each episode, host Manolo Gonzalez Vergara welcomes two teams to the Celebrity Family Food Battle kitchen, where they are challenged to create dishes inspired by popular films and TV shows. With the coveted Golden Fork Award and money for their chosen charities at stake, the celebrity contestants will put it all on the line to impress the judges.
